title: mariyaadha gaadhayya
sahitya:
mariyAda gAdayya manupava dEmayya



anupallavi



 sarivArilO nannu caka cEyuTella shrI hari hari nIvaNTi karuNA nidhiki



caraNam



 tanavAru lanyunanE tAratamyamu munu ghanuDaina dAsharathikE galadani kIrti gadA

ninu bAyanErani nannu brOva kuNDEdi dhanada sakhuDaga tyAgarAja pUjita
